sentences: Anne-tädi ütles küll, et temal punast kopikat enam hinge taga ei ole.
Mul pole punast raha selleks kingituseks ostmiseks.
Tema on ilma punast rahata jäänud.
context: The word 'punast' is partitive singular form of the adjective 'punane', but in this context it's used idiomatically to mean 'no money at all' or 'not a cent'. It appears to be derived from 'punane raha' (red money) which refers to cash or money, and when negated means having no money whatsoever. This is an idiomatic expression rather than the literal color meaning of the word.
